text:
We had this happen the last chrome update for a few Users. If this was a logged in profile it's as simple as clicking the profile Icon in the top right corner and selecting add and signing back in. image.png [cid:ii_lnnov2cw0] If this was not a signed in User, I would look in the following locations for a good start.
 * [Chrome] %LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data
 * [Chrome Beta] %LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome Beta\User Data
 * [Chrome Canary] %LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome SxS\User Data
 * [Chromium] %LOCALAPPDATA%\Chromium\User Data

metadata.topic: Post October Updates Missing Chrome profile
